main event: A round bright white light was observed moving on an erratic course over Manchester, New Hampshire on August 15, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 11:15 PM,The object was tracked on radar as larger than a star or planet,The duration of the observation was noted to be 5 minutes,The origin and destination of the object could not be determined,The source of the sighting was a civilian.
witness description: officer stated the light appeared large on radar
